message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm confident you'll love it. As a starting point, I'd like to offer it to you for $1200000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1300000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1150000.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $1250000. This is my final offer, as I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1200000.

Bob, I'm starting to get concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm offering it to you for $1275000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher.
I appreciate your continued efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1225000.

Bob, I'm getting close to accepting your offer, but I still need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a bit more profit. I'm offering it to you for $1250000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher.
After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1237500.
